# Experiment
```{r}
## Formule: dY <-  10 - 0.1 * (Y+10)

Y <- 0
V <-  10 - 0.1 * 10
dY <- 0.1
dataset <- data.frame(Y, V, dY)

Y <- 1
while (dY != 0){
  dY <- 10 - (0.1 * (V+10))
  V <- V + dY
  df <- data.frame(Y, V, dY)
  dataset <- rbind(dataset, df)
  Y <- Y + 1
}
```
